main event: A round object approximately 50 feet in diameter was observed hovering stationary over Onida, South Dakota for 8-10 minutes.
interesting points: The object was at approximately 1,000 feet in altitude., No sound was heard during the observation., Witnesses were uncertain about the identification of the object, suspecting it might be a weather balloon., The sighting lasted for a duration of 8-10 minutes without any movement., The object disappeared suddenly after the observation period.
witness description: Major M.C. Lewis from Ellsworth AFB, Rapid City, SD, who was on leave at Onida.
